data.name: Kingdom Two Crowns: Shogun
data.detailed_description:
Kingdom Two Crowns will be expanded with post-release updates that will venture to exotic biomes across the world. On day 1 of release, players can journey to lands inspired by the landscape, architecture, and culture of feudal Japan. Play as the mighty Shogun or Onna-bugeisha, enlist the support of the ninja, lead your soldiers to battle atop the mythological Kirin, and form new strategies as you brave the Greed hiding in the thick bamboo forests.

We will continue to keep the feeling of exploration, discovery, and strategy alive in Kingdom Two Crowns with many more themed biomes, each with unique styles and features that marvel the eye while changing how you rule the lands.

data.short_description: Kingdom Two Crowns will be expanded with post-release updates that will venture to exotic biomes across the world. On day 1 of release, players can journey to lands inspired by the landscape, architecture, and culture of feudal Japan.
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, French, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel 4th Gen Dual Core 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvida GTX Series 8
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game can likely run on lower rated hardware, but we can't guarantee the performance.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 7th Gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX Series 10
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This recommended is base don what many of us tested the game on while in development and confident it supports a smooth experience.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX
  • Processor: Intel 5th Gen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game can likely run on lower rated hardware, but we can't guarantee the performance.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX
  • Processor: Intel 7th Gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
